title: Thunderbird Crashing - Continuously
content:
Hello,

I am still having problems with Thunderbird crashing on startup

I first asked about this issue on the 2nd September, here: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1461731

I have been submitting Crash reports per business day except for the last couple.

Here are the Submitted Crash ID's, I have been submitting reports as the crashes happen. :

Crash ID: ⁨bp-3b69ccf2-e3c1-431c-bada-e4f2e0240902⁩ Crash ID: ⁨bp-4c4852b8-6599-40b5-97b1-943930240902⁩ Crash ID: ⁨bp-09a86b67-a698-4c2e-a98f-e89f70240903⁩ Crash ID: ⁨bp-526167eb-c915-47fc-8065-f0b140240902⁩ Crash ID: ⁨bp-8965165b-c579-415d-9cb3-cdd010240903⁩ Crash ID: ⁨bp-a8aaf596-7dfc-43b5-8526-e204d0240902⁩ Crash ID: ⁨bp-b45149f4-8bb8-44df-84e4-b78fe0240902⁩ Crash ID: ⁨bp-c284df19-7d63-469a-af6c-9ff6c0240903⁩

More available if needed

Notably, I have 2 computers each with Thunderbird, each accessing the same account. I have no problem on the other computer. I am using no addons on the crashing computer. Any assistance would be appreciated.

Best

Cheers and thanks in antici...pation!

title: Data-Import-Problem because of a collision of program-versions after updating Thunderbird?
content: On Friday 24/09/06, I deleted my thunderbird-profile-file without immediately realizing it. I realized it on Monday 24/09/07, by opening the program and getting an error message. A new profile-file was immediately initialized by the program and also a program-update was made to version 128.2.0esr (32-Bit)). Unfortunately, I do not know the version, I used before the update Using your instructions from the Mozilla knowledge-base, I was able to restore the file-situation, as it was before my mistake killing my profile. Although trying now for three days getting the old data (inbox, sent mails, address book) in the new profile by importing or over writing I didn't have any success. Trying to import old profile-data by the program-tool results in an error message. When overwriting the existing files with the old ones, I get new folders, but they were all empty. After long time of research in your knowledge-base, trying mentioned solutions without success, I suppose that it is no more a question of recreating a knew profile but a question of the program-update made on Monday and a data conflict between the two program versions. I Think the new version cannot handle with the old data. I would like to install the version I used before the update, but do not know whether which version it was nor where I could find an old program-version? Or is there a possibility to manage old data with the new version, and I do not know it? Perhaps you can reconstruct the old program-version by seeing the content in the folders of my old profile-file appended below (explorer screen shot) I would be grateful if You could help me retrieving my old data (Inbox, sent etc.).
creator: lundis1970

creator: platinum198

title: really struggling to get thunderbird to work like my outlook 2007 does
content:
The topic that best describes my question is not in the list :-(

I got the dreaded email saying outlook 2007 will stop working in september 2024 but am very confused.

Bit of background, we run a small family partnership and have 20 years of archive .pst files. We use outlook 2007 to store our customers details in the address book along with their order details, customer number etc. Plus we use the calendar for important dates like tax and when to pay suppliers.

We have our own domains (9 in total with several email address for each - about 30 email addresses) which we download the emails from into outlook 2007 so we can store those emails and orders in the .pst file and easily find them again plus archive them each year. Outlook gives us the choice of if the emails should be removed from the server or not - some we do and some we don't for various reasons.

I have downloaded thunderbird as that is what was suggested as a replacement. Tried importing, some things came across and some didn't. Some emails, except those in the sent folder, came across. None of the accounts came across nor the address book. The folder tree was very odd too as all folders were under a folder called "outlook import". I had added my hotmail address when i first opened thunderbird and then added one of our domains emails manually, it showed all the folders in that domain email, that is not really want i wanted, i just want to download the emails in the inbox of our email address. Then i would move it to where it needed to be - orders, customer questions, suppliers emails etc.

I then saw in the help files that i should use the 31 version then upgrade after importing, so i started again.

I started with the address book as that is very important as i have 31k in there. Very little info came across, some were missing names, some missing customer numbers, and it is very difficult to get to the "other" field which contains all their order numbers. With outlook all of that is there when you open a contact AND when you view as a list.

So my questions to start with are .....

1. Which version of thunderbird should i be using to import outlook 2007?

2. How do i get all the contact info over?

3. How can i make the address book interface more user friendly?

4. Is outlook 2007 actually going to stop working for how we work or have i been misled?

Hope someone can help or point me in the direct of other help available. I have already read a lot of the help files, questions and answers and felt so confused i thought i would just ask :-)
creator: contact1089

title: Dotaz k trvalému odstranění výzvy "Přihlaste se do Mozilla Thunderbird přes Google".
content: Používám v notebooku operační systém Windows 11 a pro příjem a odesílání zpráv poštovního klienta Mozilla Thunderbird. Nikoliv zakomponovanou poštu od Microsoftu. Nyní se mi začala objevovat na monitoru tabulka, která požaduje, abych se přihlašoval do aplikace Mozilla Thunderbird Email přes Google. Nic takového ale nechci, vyžaduje přístupová hesla. Do Mozilly Thunderbird se ke zprávám dostanu dřívějším obvyklým způsobem, ale když ji uložím do lišty na hlavním panelu, na velké části obrazovky zůstává pořád ta tabulka s výzvou, že se musím přihlásit do Googlu. Když ji také uložím na hlavní panel, zůstane na obrazovce obrovská bílá plocha, která mi svým překrytím znemožňuje viditelný přístup k ikonám na ploše a k další práci na počítači. Ve Správci úloh pro zrušení neznám běžící program, který toto ovlivňuje. Nevím, zda to neovlivňují nějaké aplikace Microsoftu, například jeho poštovní program, Outlook(new), Bing.com nebo Microsoft Edge nebo další programy od Microsoftu? Nepotřebuji žádnou synchronizaci mých poštovních zpráv do cloudových úložišť a podobně. Rozhodně se nechci k vyzvedávání a odesílání mých poštovních zpráv přihlašovat přes Google. Mohu tento požadavek zrušit v nějakém programu, aby se mi ta výzva dále neobjevovala?
creator: buk144

title: Thunderbird and Microsoft
content:
Wat to do with this e-mail (I use Thunderbird on Microsoft Windws 11 on my PC):


Microsoft logo

Update your sign-in technology before September 16th, 2024 to maintain email access.

The safety and security of your information is top priority for Microsoft. To help keep your account secure, Microsoft will no longer support the use of third-party email and calendar apps which ask you to sign in with only your Microsoft Account username and password. To keep you safe you will need to use a mail or calendar app which supports Microsoft’s modern authentication methods. If you do not act, your third-party email apps will no longer be able to access your Outlook.com, Hotmail or Live.com email address on September 16th.


What do you need to do?

If you are receiving this email, you are currently using an email or calendar app that uses a less secure authentication method to connect to your Outlook.com email account. You will need to upgrade your third-party mail and calendar app to a version which supports modern authentication methods.

Microsoft provides free versions of Outlook for your PC, Mac, iOS, and Android devices which can be easily downloaded and connect to your email account. Using an updated version of an Outlook application will ensure you are connecting in the most secure way.

How can you set up your Gmail, Apple Mail, or other third-party mail application?

Various non-Microsoft applications will have their own steps for connecting to your Outlook.com email account using modern authentication methods. See our help article - Modern Authentication Methods now needed to continue syncing Outlook Email in non-Microsoft email apps. However, you may need to contact the creators of those applications to provide you with instructions. In many cases, simply removing and re-adding your account with the latest version of that application will configure it to use modern authentication methods.

Privacy Statement

Microsoft Corporation, One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA 98052 USA
creator: nverhoeckx

title: Problemer med login på hotmail.com
content:
Jeg har problemer med login på microsofts server, så jeg sender en kopi af mailen fra dem. Hilsen Karlo Kristensen, pindsvinekrattet@hotmail.com



Den 16. september 2024 vil apps, der bruger mindre sikker logon-teknologi, ikke længere kunne få adgang til din mail.

Sikkerheden for dine oplysninger har meget høj prioritet for Microsoft. For at hjælpe med at holde din konto sikker vil Microsoft ikke længere understøtte brugen af mail- og kalenderapps fra tredjepart, som beder om at logge på med kun brugernavnet og adgangskoden for din Microsoft-konto. For at holde dig mere sikker skal du bruge en mail- eller kalenderapp, som understøtter Microsofts moderne godkendelsesmetoder. Hvis du ikke foretager dig noget, vil dine mailapps fra tredjepart ikke længere kunne få adgang til din Outlook.com-, Hotmail- eller Live.com-mailadresse fra den 16. september 2024.

Hvad skal du gøre?

Hvis du modtager denne mail, bruger du i øjeblikket en mail- eller kalenderapp, der bruger en mindre sikker godkendelsesmetode til at oprette forbindelse til din Outlook.com-mailkonto. Du skal opgradere din mail- og kalenderapp fra tredjepart til en version, der understøtter moderne godkendelsesmetoder.

Microsoft tilbyder gratis versioner af Outlook til dine pc'er, Macs, iOS- og Android-enheder, som nemt kan downloades og forbindes til din mailkonto. Når du bruger en opdateret version af en Outlook-app, kan du være sikker på, at du opretter forbindelse på den mest sikre måde.

Hvordan kan du konfigurere din Gmail, Apple Mail eller andre mailapps fra tredjepart?

Forskelle ikke-Microsoft-apps vil have deres egne trin til at oprette forbindelse til din Outlook.com-mailkonto ved hjælp af moderne godkendelsesmetoder. Se vores hjælpeartikel – Moderne godkendelsesmetoder er nu påkrævet for fortsat at synkronisere Outlook-mail i ikke-Microsoft-mailapps. Det kan dog være nødvendigt at kontakte udvikleren af disse apps for at få vejledning. I mange tilfælde kan du konfigurere den pågældende app til at bruge moderne godkendelsesmetoder ved blot at fjerne din konto og tilføje den igen med den nyeste version af appen.

Erklæring om beskyttelse af personlige oplysninger

Microsoft Corporation, One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA 98052 USA

title: How can I complete the move of Thunderbird from Drive C: to Drive D:?
content:
I run Thunderbird on a PC, and, to free up space on Drive C:, I have moved the contents of the folder Thunderbird in Appdata to Drive D:. I then changed my Server Settings, in Thunderbird, from C: to D:, and note that any new mail is indeed now appearing there along with those already transferred. This move could save me a valuable 6 gig of space, and more in the future, however, I am unable to remove that original Thunderbird folder entirely, notably I am unable to remove the contents of the Profiles folder, as it is still linked to the application. Notably with cookies.sqlite, cookies.sqlite-shm, store.json, mozlz4, aborted-session-ping and many others, which I note some have continued to be updated. I have been unable to find any other settings in Thunderbird referring to Drive C:, other than those in Server Settings.

I could presume that if I installed another version of Thunderbird on Drive D: and maybe moved those existing contents of the Thunderbird folder on C: onto Drive D:, and made those numerous settings changes to the App it could work. But I ask is there an easier way to complete this move? How can I complete this transition of Thunderbird from Drive C: to Drive D:?
creator: alan.macleay1
